name: Bind (Vector Game Studios)
description:
Bind

GMTK Game Jam Entry!

In Bind you control orbs that you can throw and they will come back at you, you can also teleport to them creating new possibilities for movement.

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

A&D -> Movement

Space Bar -> Jump

Mouse Right Click -> Throw Orb

Mouse Left Click -> Teleport to Orb

I had a lot of fun making this and I am considering making more levels to explore more ideas with this concept. If you have the time please leave your feedback!

Thanks,

Vector
